activities: A database of our worldwide employees including those EU employees will be maintained in the US, this data base will contain personal information related to our employees including name, date of hire, date of birth, work history with group, compensation information and specific clients that employee has been engaged with.  Information is for internal use only.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We have committed to comply with any EU directive and to respond to any complaint initiated by an employee in compliance with and adhering to respective EU law and or regulation. To ensure compliance with these Safe Harbor Principles, Management Consulting Group will: Commit to cooperate with the Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) of the EU countries and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) (for information received from Switzerland) in the investigation and resolution of complaints and will comply with any advice given by DPAs/FDPIC.
